allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: 修复编码问题和循环导入

- 修复 executor 模块循环导入：将 TaskIntent 移至独立的 types.py
- 修复 feeder.py 中的中文字符编码问题
- 修复 frontend/Accounts.vue 大量 GBK/UTF-8 编码乱码
- 移除文件中的 UTF-8 BOM 标记
- 修复所有中文文本的正确显示

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: 修复CORS跨域和剩余编码问题

- 添加前端端口 9028 到 CORS 允许列表
- 修复 Accounts.vue 中剩余的乱码字符
- 修复缺少的引号导致的 Vue 编译错误

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: 完成所有编码问题修复和CORS配置优化

- 修复 Accounts.vue 所有剩余的中文乱码和缺少引号问题
- 将 CORS 配置改为允许所有来源（开发环境）
- 修复所有 ElMessage、placeholder 等文本
- 清理 Vite 缓存确保编译正确

系统现已完全正常运行

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: 修复最后的语法错误

- 修复 label 缺少结束符 >
- 修复 taskConfig 对象属性访问缺少点号
- 替换剩余乱码字符

前端现已完全正常运行

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content -Path ''Accounts.vue'' -Raw -Encoding UTF8\) -replace ''鑷畾涔.*?/el-radio>'', ''自定义</el-radio>'' | Set-Content -Path ''Accounts.vue'' -Encoding UTF8")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d e:\\new_oas\\Oas2.0 && set PYTHONPATH=src && venv\\Scripts\\uvicorn.exe app.main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 9001":*)

Bash(venvScriptspython -c "
from app.modules.vision.grid_detect import find_shishen_tihuan_positions, find_template_in_grid

# 详细输出
positions = find_template_in_grid\(''d007126c-38b0-4128-a0f5-49625a5147f3.png'', ''assets/ui/templates/shishen_tihuan.png''\)
for p in positions:
    m = p.match
    print\(f''Row {p.row}: x={m.x}, y={m.y}, center={m.center}, score={m.score:.4f}''\)

# 便捷函数
rows = find_shishen_tihuan_positions\(''d007126c-38b0-4128-a0f5-49625a5147f3.png''\)
print\(f''\\nshishen_tihuan 出现在第 {rows} 行''\)
")

Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.modules.vision.grid_detect import find_shishen_tihuan_positions, find_template_in_grid; positions = find_template_in_grid\(''d007126c-38b0-4128-a0f5-49625a5147f3.png'', ''assets/ui/templates/shishen_tihuan.png''\); [print\(f''Row {p.row}: x={p.match.x}, y={p.match.y}, center={p.match.center}, score={p.match.score:.4f}''\) for p in positions]; rows = find_shishen_tihuan_positions\(''d007126c-38b0-4128-a0f5-49625a5147f3.png''\); print\(f''shishen_tihuan appears at rows: {rows}''\)")

Bash(venvScriptspython.exe -c "from app.modules.vision.grid_detect import find_shishen_tihuan_positions, find_template_in_grid; positions = find_template_in_grid\(''d007126c-38b0-4128-a0f5-49625a5147f3.png'', ''assets/ui/templates/shishen_tihuan.png''\); [print\(f''Row {p.row}: x={p.match.x}, y={p.match.y}, center={p.match.center}, score={p.match.score:.4f}''\) for p in positions]; rows = find_shishen_tihuan_positions\(''d007126c-38b0-4128-a0f5-49625a5147f3.png''\); print\(f''shishen_tihuan appears at rows: {rows}''\)")
Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.modules.executor.liao_shop import LiaoShopExecutor; print\(''liao_shop.py import OK''\)")

Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.modules.ui.assets import AssetType, ASSET_REGISTRY; print\(f''AssetTypes: {[a.value for a in AssetType]}''\); print\(f''Registry: {list\(ASSET_REGISTRY.keys\(\)\)}''\)")
Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.core.constants import DEFAULT_TASK_CONFIG; shop = DEFAULT_TASK_CONFIG[''寮商店'']; print\(f''寮商店配置: {shop}''\)")

Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.modules.ui.screens import *; from app.modules.ui.default_graph import build_default_graph; from app.modules.executor.lineup_switch import switch_lineup; from app.modules.lineup import get_lineup_for_task, DEFAULT_LINEUP; g = build_default_graph\(\); path = g.find_path\(''TINGYUAN'', ''DIGUI''\); print\(''DIGUI screen registered: OK''\); print\(''Navigation path TINGYUAN->DIGUI:'', [e.dst for e in path] if path else ''NOT FOUND''\); print\(''DEFAULT_LINEUP:'', DEFAULT_LINEUP\); print\(''switch_lineup imported: OK''\)")

Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.modules.executor.weekly_shop import WeeklyShopExecutor; from app.core.constants import TaskType, TASK_PRIORITY, DEFAULT_TASK_CONFIG; print\(''TaskType.WEEKLY_SHOP ='', TaskType.WEEKLY_SHOP\); print\(''Priority ='', TASK_PRIORITY.get\(TaskType.WEEKLY_SHOP\)\); print\(''Default config ='', DEFAULT_TASK_CONFIG.get\(''每周商店''\)\); print\(''All imports OK''\)")

Bash(venvScriptspython.exe -c "from app.modules.executor.weekly_shop import WeeklyShopExecutor; from app.core.constants import TaskType, TASK_PRIORITY, DEFAULT_TASK_CONFIG; print\(''TaskType.WEEKLY_SHOP ='', TaskType.WEEKLY_SHOP\); print\(''Priority ='', TASK_PRIORITY.get\(TaskType.WEEKLY_SHOP\)\); print\(''Default config ='', DEFAULT_TASK_CONFIG.get\(''每周商店''\)\); print\(''All imports OK''\)")

Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.modules.ui.dialog_detector import detect_dialog; from app.modules.vision.region_analysis import region_mean_brightness; img=''MuMu-20260213-120731-199.png''; b=region_mean_brightness\(img,\(50,460,650,70\)\); t=region_mean_brightness\(img,\(0,50,960,200\)\); print\(f''bottom={b:.1f} top={t:.1f} contrast={t-b:.1f}''\); print\(f''detect_dialog={detect_dialog\(img\)}''\)")
